posts.message:
ده ازاى يعنى !
كل المواقع بتفتح بس جوجل لأ ,, وسألت ناس مش فى مصر شغال معاهم بس اللى فى مصر كلهم قالولى مش شغال !!
تعديل: المشكلة اتحلت لوحدها وجوجل فتح معاية دلوقتى :D ,, شكرأ جدأ على المساعدة ☺✋

انا نازل مصر ان شاء الله كمان أسبوعين، هل فيه مجال اننا نعمل زي هانجاوت في مكان عام للي عاوز يحضر؟ الموضوع مش محاضرات و كده مجرد دردشة جيكس يعني زي اللي احنا بنعمله هنا. لو حد متحمس للفكرة يقول و ممكن ساعتها نحاول نشوف مكان و معاد كويس.

سؤال عام من واقع تجاربكم العملية مع الأقراص الصلبة المتنقلة. Portable Hard Disk ايه هي افضل ماركة او حتى موديل من ماركة معينة (في مصر) من وجهة نظركم من حيث العمر الافتراضي (المتانة يعني :) ) لأني بفكر جديا في الهجرة للينكس والموضوع هيحتاج قدرة نسخ احتياطي جامدة وموثوقة.

Anybody experienced issues with communication with Web Service using USB / Mobile Internet provided by Mobinil ?

What I mean is like getting unwanted data like ads or something in the response ? Does Mobinil ( Orange ) does that ?

I have many devices communicating with Severs using Orange internet ( USB / Mobile Internet ), and sometimes they doesn't get the expected response at all, doing a debug code now to track that, but just wanted to ask if someone face issues like that ..

Sure I have all errors turned off on the server side, as I have them logged in files.
in quit of job in web company, i can't take projects i contributed in ?!  i made my own handwriting code in it "source code, snippets" ?

Human resources Management Practical Course for Entry Level ..
Join us ;)
posts.caption: Human Resources Management
posts.description:
HRM Workshop for Entry Level - 6 Days
Agenda: 
- Human Resources Management Problems in Egypt 
- Human Capital 
- HRM Career path
- Organization structure
- What Everyone Should Know about Job Analysis 
. Uses of job analysis
. Methods of collecting job analysis information
. Job description
. Job Specification 
-Training process and Development 
. Training process
. Training methods
.  Evaluating the training effort
- Recruitment and Selection process. 
.Recruitment plan 
. Recruitment Problems 
. Interview 
. Types of Interview 
. Types of Questions
- Performance management 
. Why do we need performance management?
. Steps of Performance management.
. Formal methods of Performance appraisal.
- Compensation and Benefits
-----------------------------------
Time:
Saturday 03/09 from 11:00AM to 04:00PM 
(every saturday for 6 weeks)

-----------------------------------
Trainer:

Aya Samir 
- HR trainer and Consultant
- HR & Legal chief officer in Al Saleem Telecom 
- Human Resources Practical Diploma From AUC 
- Master in labor & social low from Cairo University
- MBA from garden York from New York 
- HRBP (human resources business professional) from HRCI (human resources certificates institute )

linked in Profile: eg.linkedin.com/in/hrayasamir
facebook Profile: www.facebook.com/hrayasamir
-----------------------------------
Your Investment:

- Normal Fees:  640  EGP. (Deadline 1st of Oct)
- Early Bird: 530 EGP( Deadline 25th of Sep).
- Group Price: for 2 or more 530 EGP.
